pages.title: Blind Cave Bear
pages.text: The Blind Cave Bear is a large, subterranean predator that can be rarely found deep underground. $(br2)Unlike their surface relatives, Blind Cave Bears can be identified by their shaggy, emaciated appearance, their empty gaze and their vicious temperament.

pages.title: Blind Cave Bear
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Randomly active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:beef$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 8 Days
